content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT rate_code_id, rate_code
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT ='CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION ='1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    with(
        jsondoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) 
    AS rate_code
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondoc)
    WITH(
        rate_code_id TINYINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(20) 
    );
-------------quering multyline json---


SELECT rate_code_id, rate_code
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code_multi_line.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT ='CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION ='1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    with(
        jsondoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) 
    AS rate_code
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondoc)
    WITH(
        rate_code_id TINYINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(20) 
    );
